Task.Description: Check for finger prints in the crime scene in order to to obtain incriminating evidence
Task.Remarks: Check for finger prints of possible partners in crime

Task.Description: Go over security cameras phootages in order to identify the criminal's face
Task.Remarks: Check for photages of possible partners in crime

Task.Description: Look for the criminal's identity in government databases according to the fingerprints and photoges found
Search previous bank activities of the criminal
Locate the criminal's house
Task.Remarks: Pay attention if there are multiple adresses

Task.Description: Locate the criminal's car
Plant a citation device in the criminal's car
Hack security Cameras in the criminal's house
Task.Remarks: Hack to the street security cameras to surround the whole area

Task.Description: Find optional witnesses in order to get more evidences
Investigate first witness
Investigate second witness
Investigate third witness
Make a detailed report about the criminal's past
Task.Deliverables: Full report on the criminal's past
Task.Remarks: Include jobs, family situation and acquaintances

Task.Description: Compare the testimonies of the witnesses in order to check reliability
Task.Remarks: take into account real photages from the crime ciene

Task.Description: Make a report on the witnesses testimonies and their conclusions
Task.Deliverables: Full documanted report on the testimonies

Task.Description: Watch the criminal's house and check for suspicious activities
Task.Deliverables: Information about the conduct of the criminal's home
Task.Remarks: Suspiciouse activities may be leaving the house at strange hours, unknown visiters etc.

Task.Description: Make a live model of the criminal's house in order to prepare for the raid
Task.Deliverables: Full sketch of the criminal's house
Task.Remarks: Pay attention to multiple entrences and escape routes

Task.Description: Follow the criminal around for a whole day in order to understand his daily routine
Task.Deliverables: Accurate information on the criminal's daily schedule

Task.Description: Make a report about the daily schedule of the criminal
Task.Deliverables: Full documanted report on the criminal's daily schedule

Task.Description: Implant a chip in the criminal's phone
Task.Deliverables: implanted chip in the criminal's phone

Task.Description: Have a staff meeting about your finding and plan the final act
Task.Deliverables: An updated staff with a plan for the next move
Task.Remarks: Take into account the past report, witnesses testemonies and daily schedule.

Task.Description: Check the functionality of the equipment needed to the final mission
Buy/fix equipment as needed
Practice in Ranges
Build a simulation of the final mission
Task.Deliverables: Simulation of the day of the raid
Task.Remarks: pay attention to possible surprises ike people who might appear in the ciene

Task.Description: Practice the simulatin
Quote to implanted devices in the criminal's care and personal phone
Task.Deliverables: Information about phone calls and secret meetings

Task.Description: Decide on the final raid details according to the results of the simulation
Task.Remarks: The details contain:the agents who will take part in the mission, the time of the raid etc.
